Topic: blog post on my personal career change in my mid-30s (from lawyer to software engineer).
TargetAudience: The ideal reader is a mid-career professional from any demanding, non-technical field (like finance, consulting, or marketing) who feels stuck and is curious about pivoting to software engineering. They are seeking a relatable, first-hand account that demystifies the process of learning to code later in life and proves that a dramatic career shift is achievable.
AdditionalContext: I like to include one or two trending movie or tv show references.
